Key Match Events: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort with a 22-ball 52 and bowling figures of 2/16.
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 14 runs.
Pakistan won by 33 runs using the DLS method.
South Africa was set a revised target of 142 runs in 14 overs after rain interruption.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain curtailed the match, reducing it to 14 overs per side.
South Africa missed the services of their ace batter David Miller due to an injury.
